TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LogicalTreeHelper extends System.Object
public ref class LogicalTreeHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于查询逻辑树中的对象的静态帮助器方法。

span.span: Provides static helper methods for querying objects in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的方法可用于返回对象的子集合, 或从逻辑树的子节点内返回特定对象。The class provides methods that you can use to return child collections of objects, or specific objects from within subnodes of the logical tree. 但是, 您通常执行的大多数对象树操作也由或 上的类似方法或属性公开。However, most of the object tree operations that you typically perform are also exposed by similar methods or properties on or . 例如, 尝试以下操作:For example, try the following: - 不调用返回逻辑子对象的枚举器的静态方法, 而是使用在该对象的内容模型中公开的专用集合。Instead of calling the static method, which returns an enumerator for the logical child objects, use the dedicated collection exposed in the content model for that object. 几乎所有支持内容模型的对象都公开了某些包含子对象集合的属性, 并直接在该集合上提供集合接口支持。Nearly all objects that support a content model expose some property that contains the collection of child objects, and provides collection interface support directly on that collection. - 不是调用静态方法来通过指定子对象的名称来获取子对象, 而是对特定对象调用或方法。Instead of calling the static method to obtain a child object by specifying its name, call the or method on specific objects. 对于分析方案非常有用, 在这种情况下, 将以递归方式遍历逻辑树, 并使用一致的方法检查各种父对象或子对象。 is most useful for analysis scenarios where you are traveling up or down the logical tree recursively through multiple levels, and want to use a consistent approach for examining the various parent or child objects. 在这种情况下, 你可能会访问混合内容模型, 使用更多内容模型的特定 Api 会过于复杂。In this case, you might be accessing a mixture of content models, and using the more content-model specific APIs would be too complex.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BringIntoView (System.Windows.DependencyObject current);
.method public static hidebysig void BringIntoView(class System.Windows.DependencyObject current) cil managed
Public Shared Sub BringIntoView (current As DependencyObject)
public: static void BringIntoView(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ current);
static member BringIntoView : System.Windows.DependencyObject -> unit

param.name: current
param.span: 要使其可见的 UI 元素。

span.span: The UI element to bring into view.

summary.span: 尝试使所请求的 UI 元素可见，并在目标上引发 事件以报告结果。

span.span: Attempts to bring the requested UI element into view and raises the event on the target in order to report the results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 调用实例方法或而不是此静态实用工具方法更方便。It is typically more convenient to call the instance methods or rather than this static utility method. 实例方法的行为等效于静态方法的行为。The behavior of the instance methods is equivalent to the behavior of the static method. 即使提供的 UI 元素是 , 生成的事件仍为同一事件, 并通过检查事件的事件数据来进行源标识。 `current`Even if the `current` UI element provided was a , the resulting event is still the same event, with the originating identifiable by checking the event data of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.DependencyObject FindLogicalNode (System.Windows.DependencyObject logicalTreeNode, string elementName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.DependencyObject FindLogicalNode(class System.Windows.DependencyObject logicalTreeNode, string elementName) cil managed
Public Shared Function FindLogicalNode (logicalTreeNode As DependencyObject, elementName As String) As DependencyObject
public: static System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ FindLogicalNode(System::Windows::DependencyObject ^ logicalTreeNode, System::String ^ elementName);
static member FindLogicalNode : System.Windows.DependencyObject * string -> System.Windows.DependencyObject

span.span: The object to start searching from.
This object must be either a or a .
The name of the object to find.

summary.span: 尝试查找并返回具有指定名称的对象。

span.span: Attempts to find and return an object that has the specified name.

summary.span: 搜索从指定对象开始，并持续到逻辑树的子节点中。

span.span: The search starts from the specified object and continues into subnodes of the logical tree.

returns.span: 如果找到一个，则为具有匹配名称的元素；如果没有在逻辑树中找到匹配名称，则返回 。

span.span: The object with the matching name, if one is found; returns if no matching name was found in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 和在表面上类似于, 但使用不同的逻辑进行操作:The methods and are superficially similar to , but operate by different logic: - 的搜索方向朝向子对象 (沿树向下); `FindName`方法的搜索方向朝向父对象 (向上滚动树)。The search direction for is toward child objects (down the tree); the search direction for the `FindName` methods is towards parent objects (up the tree). - `FindName`方法由 XAML 名称范围的概念控制。The `FindName` methods are governed by the concept of a XAML namescope. 使用`FindName`可以保证只存在一个同名的对象, 因为 XAML 名称范围强制执行唯一性。Using `FindName` you are guaranteed that only one object of that name exists, because XAML namescopes enforce uniqueness. 相反, 忽略 xaml 名称范围, 并可能在搜索期间跨越 xaml 名称范围边界。In contrast, ignores XAML namescope and might cross XAML namescope boundaries during the search. 同样, 一旦超出边界, 就不能保证`elementName`名称的唯一性。As such, there is no guarantee of uniqueness of the `elementName` name once boundaries are crossed. 有关 XAML 名称范围的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF XAML 名称范围](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about XAML namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md).

summary.span: 通过处理逻辑树，返回指定对象的直接子对象的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of immediate child objects of the specified object by processing the logical tree.

param.span: 要从中开始处理逻辑树的对象。

This is expected to be either a or .

summary.span: 通过处理逻辑树返回指定的对象的即时子对象集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of immediate child objects of the specified object, by processing the logical tree.

returns.span: 来自指定对象逻辑树的即时子对象的可枚举集合。

span.span: The enumerable collection of immediate child objects from the logical tree of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您不确定`current` 是还是 , 也不确定该对象的类是否支持其自己的内容模型集合, 请主要使用此签名和帮助器方法。Use this signature and helper method primarily when you are unsure whether `current` is a or and are also unsure whether that object's class supports its own content model collection. 如果你可以确定要查询的对象的类型, 请检查你知道在该类型上存在的特定内容属性。If you can determine the type of the object you are querying, check the specific content property that you know exists on that type. 例如, 如果您知道您正在查询的对象是, 则检查属性以获取强类型集合, 该集合具有集合接口支持并且可能比枚举器更有用。For example, if you know that the object you are querying is an , check the property to get a strongly typed collection, which has collection interface support and is probably more useful than an enumerator.

The requested parent object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只是一个包装器, 用于获取 或属性的相应类型版本 (或); 因此, 除非您无法确定`current`该类型, 否则您可能需要检查相应的实例属性。This method is merely a wrapper that gets the appropriate type version ( or ) of the or property; so unless you are unable to determine the `current` type, you might want to check the respective instance properties instead.
